props.name: label
props.description: Whether to display the label text above the select field, corresponds to the 'Label' property in Figma.

props.name: state
props.description: The visual state of the component, corresponds to the 'State' property in Figma.

props.name: search
props.description: Toggles the search input field within the dropdown, corresponds to the 'Search' property in Figma.

props.name: quickActions
props.description: Toggles the 'Select All' and 'Clear' actions, corresponds to the 'Quick actions' property in Figma.

props.name: placeholder
props.description: Optional placeholder text for the select field.
